work-item.field:
When starting new projects in your company which might be using new processes, environments, etc. you should have a place where they can track their questions. This way you have a central place for all these question and in addition you will have some sort of knowledge base, which helps new users to get an answer to their question.
During this training we will create such a project which can be used afterwards in your environment.

You will use your new project for all exercises throughout this training
  • Select "Create a new project"

  • click next and add following project data
    • Name = [Know How "YOUR NAME"]
    • TrackerPrefix = KNOW
  • Create a new project in Sandbox/[Your Project Name] using following template
  • Open Project Home Page
